Stores the density of the screen obtained from the SelectorSwitch.context.
selectMode(int) - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Selects the specified mode in the switch and rotates the knob to point to the specified mode.
SelectorDial - Class in adk.selectorswitch
SelectorDial describes the dial used in a selector switch.

Constructs a selector dial and initialises its properties based on the given values.
SelectorDial(Context, int, int, int) - Constructor for class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorDial
Similar to the first constructor; except here only the starting and the ending colors are needed.
selectorDial - Variable in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Stores the selector dial used in the selector switch.
selectorDialColors - Variable in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Stores the int[] of colors for the different modes of the switch.
selectorDialRectF - Variable in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Stores the boundaries that define the position of the selector dial on the canvas.
SelectorKnob - Class in adk.selectorswitch
SelectorKnob describes the knob used in the selector switch and has the structure shown here.
SelectorKnob(Context, int, int) - Constructor for class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorKnob
Initialises the knob's properties based on default values.
selectorKnob - Variable in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorKnobAnimator
The selector knob being animated.
selectorKnob - Variable in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Stores the selector knob used in the selector switch.
SelectorKnobAnimator - Class in adk.selectorswitch
SelectorKnobAnimator is built on top of AsyncTask and is used primarily by SelectorSwitch to animate the rotation of its knob when the mode of the switch is changed.
SelectorKnobAnimator(SelectorSwitch, SelectorKnob, float, float) - Constructor for class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorKnobAnimator
Create an Async task to animate the knob's rotation.
selectorSwitch - Variable in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorKnobAnimator
The selector switch whose knob has to be animated.
SelectorSwitch - Class in adk.selectorswitch
SelectorSwitch is a UI component for android (5.0+) inspired by the ACTIVE DYNAMICS PANEL found in most of the McLaren road cars.
SelectorSwitch(Context) - Constructor for class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Initialises all the parameters of the selector switch.
SelectorSwitch(Context, AttributeSet) - Constructor for class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Initialises all the parameters of the selector switch.
SelectorUtil - Class in adk.selectorswitch
SelectorUtil is a utility helper class used mainly by SelectorDial and SelectorKnob classes.
SelectorUtil() - Constructor for class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorUtil
 
setColorForDialMode(int, int) - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Updates the color and the paint for an individual mode in the dial, indicated by its index, and redraws the view.
setDialColors(List<Integer>) - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorDial
Updates the SelectorDial.dialColors of the dial and re-initialises SelectorDial.dialPaints based on the new list of colors.
setDialColors(int, int) - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorDial
Updates the SelectorDial.dialColors of the dial and re-initialises SelectorDial.dialPaints using the list of blended colors generated from the given two colors.
setDialColors(int, int) - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Updates the colors used for the modes and re-initialises the paints which will be used to draw the modes.
setDialColors(List<Integer>) - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Updates SelectorSwitch.selectorDialColors for the selector dial and redraws the view.
setDialModeCount(int) - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorDial
Updates the SelectorDial.dialModeCount of the dial.

Updates the color for a specified mode in the dial and re co
setModeCount(int) - Method in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Updates the total number of modes in the selector switch and blends in the current starting and ending color to create new colors for the new intermediate modes (if any).
space - Variable in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
Stores the additional padding, used by the switch on top of the padding from layout XML, in pixels.
SPACE_DIP - Static variable in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
The default space in DP Units used as an additional padding on top of the padding specified in the layout.
STEP_ANGLE - Static variable in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorSwitch
The default step angle used while animating the rotation of the selector knob.
stepAngle - Variable in class adk.selectorswitch.SelectorKnobAnimator
